name: mindgrid
description:
inception-like prototype made for Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and Deeper)

idea is that you can hop into the mind of enemies endlessly. I had fun working on this one, but I ran out of time. spent too much time working on AI and fighting with Unity to support the core concept.

Supports Keyboard or controller

Keyboard:

  • WASD Move
  • Mouse Aim
  • Left Mouse: Mind Control Bullet
  • Space: Jump
  • 1/2 navigate timeline
  • Enter: activate focused timeline
  • Escape: Quit!

Controller:

  • Left Stick Move
  • Right stick Aim
  • Left Trigger: Mind Control Bullet
  • Right Trigger: Jump
  • Dpad left/right - navigate timeline
  • any bumper/trigger - activate focused timeline
